pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.8: For the rendering of _dūsesuṁ_ as “raped”, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:2.16: “Group” renders _sattha_, often translated as “caravan”. Sp-ṭ 1.489: _Satthoti jaṅghasattho sakaṭasattho vā_, “_Sattho_: a _sattha_ of travelers on foot or a _sattha_ of carts.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.1.11: For the rendering of _gāma_ as “inhabited area”, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc27:3.1.13: For a discussion of the _yojana_, see _sugata_ in Appendix I: Technical Terms.
